category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PCA_Default_RevRule
preference.preference_description: Defines the default Revision Rule used during the opening of Configurator objects (e.g. Option Value, Option Family) in the "Variant Options" view. A valid value is the name of a Revision Rule that is valid for usage in Configurator application and defined in the database.
